==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=朙}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
Traditionally interpreted as an {{liushu|ic|nocap=1}}: {{zh-l|*日|sun}} + {{zh-l|*月|moon}}. However, the etymology may be more complex, as older forms of the character show the moon shining through a window ({{zh-l|*朙}}).
